effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 543,342 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 258,195.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.

Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,957 to 9,725 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 295 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Your spells have a chance to call down a Voltaic Stormrook, inflicting 254,330 Nature damage split between nearby enemies and granting 2,600 Haste, further increased for each enemy struck.
